QuestData.Title: Lao-Chin's Gambit
QuestData.Description:
Alright. Thanks to you, we have the wall under control. Good job.
I'll stay up here for a little while and make sure no more yaungol get up onto the wall.
You, though, should go back down and see what Lao-Chin has cooked up. I hate to say it, but maybe he had a good idea after all...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lao-Chin the Iron Belly at Winter's Blossom in Kun-Lai Summit.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you made it back in one piece. Thanks to your help with the barrels, I've managed to brew up a good surprise for our yaungol friends at the front.

Objectives.Objective: Talk with Suna Silentstrike to Take a Kite to Lao-Chin
